overview: Bremen, Germany - 30th May 1978  1		Sense Of Doubt  2		Beauty And The Beast  3		"Heroes"  4		Stay  5		The Jean Genie  6		TVC 15  7		Alabama Song  8		Rebel Rebel  Recorded May 30, 1978, (another source says May 21) and broadcast on August 4, 1978  Pro shot, PAL, 4/3, Stereo
